metadata.name: Womb
metadata.description:
A minute before
a millimeter from
the boundary between the world going out 
and the world they're coming to,
the soap bubble of hope,
the warmth of a parent's embrace,
a painted bright future,
a new life being built... -
will disappear
burst
cool down
erase
crumble
...forever
... before it begins

1059 children - victims of the war in Ukraine

All funds will go to the "Voices of children Charitable foundation" to support children affected by war.
